content: This American television sitcom, which aired from 1989 to 1998, was created by Larry David and Jerry Seinfeld.

You're referring to "Seinfeld," the iconic American television sitcom that indeed aired from 1989 to 1998, created by Larry David and Jerry Seinfeld. The show is renowned for its unique brand of humor, often被称为 "show about nothing," as it delved into the everyday lives and observations of its main characters: Jerry, George, Elaine, and Kramer. Over its nine-season run, "Seinfeld" gained a massive following and is widely regarded as one of the greatest television sitcoms of all time.
